actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to revise the pay structure for nonsupervisory positions of deputy U.S. marshal, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Revises the pay structure for nonsupervisory positions of deputy United States marshal, to GS rates 7, 9, and 11. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 5366)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to revise the pay structure for nonsupervisory positions of deputy U.S. marshal, and for other purposes.
